version_description:
Welcome to Nexo 1.0.1
- Request ‘Early Access’ for the Nexo Card. Share this amazing news with your best friends only and be amongst the first to receive your Nexo Card.
- Usability improvements.
- Bug fixes.

We have fixed some bugs to make your Nexo experience even smoother.
No big changes, just a shine.

Big announcements come with big updates - Nexo is officially the crypto lender with the lowest rates for borrowing.
The annual percentage rate (APR) on Nexo’s Instant Crypto Credit Lines now starts from only 5.9%.
We are the only ones to conduct business at #ZeroFees which means no origination, no liquidation and no hidden fees.
The interest rates on our ‘Earn Interest’ product remains unchanged at 8%.

We also made some minor bug fixes to make your experience even smoother.
Having processed more than $1 billion in just 18 months, your feedback is more important to us than ever, please let us know what you think at feedback@nexo.io.

Earn on Crypto is here!
Download and Enjoy our New Product that brings you up to 10% interest on Fiat (GBP, EUR and USD) and Stablecoins (USDT, USDC, DAI, PAX, TUSD) and up to 5% on cryptocurrencies – XRP, XLM, LTC, BCH, EOS; BTC and ETH are going live in the upcoming weeks.

Let us know what you think at feedback@nexo.io or contact our 24/7 Customer Support.

Welcome to the new Nexo Wallet App 2.0!

We’ve rebuilt the app from the ground up to make it even easier for you to unlock the full power of your crypto.

Here’s what’s new:

→ We've cleaned up the dashboard and the onboarding experience to show you our most popular features and make you feel at home even quicker.
→ You now have the option to hide all zero balances within the Wallet tab – turn this ‘on’ for a tidier look.
→ Because privacy is precious, there’s a new privacy setting, too – we’ve added the option to hide your balances from prying eyes.
→ We’ve simplified the Exchange experience within the app – there are now separate UX flows for buying, selling, and swapping your assets.
→ You can flip the rate between market pairs to see how cryptocurrency prices compare to each other.

Overall, this major revamp moves our app to a new codebase that’s more stable, allowing us to fix bugs more quickly and release new features on a more regular basis.

The Nexo Wallet App 2.0 is just the beginning – we’ve already got some exciting things in the pipeline. Our team will keep working their socks off, releasing new features, and bringing you the most innovative crypto products out there!

Welcome to the new Nexo Wallet App 2.0!

We’ve rebuilt the app from the ground up to make it even easier for you to unlock the full power of your crypto.

Here’s what’s new:

→ We've cleaned up the dashboard and the onboarding experience to show you our most popular features and make you feel at home even quicker.
→ You now have the option to hide all zero balances within the Wallet tab – turn this ‘on’ for a tidier look.
→ Because privacy is precious, there’s a new privacy setting, too – we’ve added the option to hide your balances from prying eyes.
→ We’ve simplified the Exchange experience within the app – there are now separate UX flows for buying, selling, and swapping your assets.
→ You can flip the rate between market pairs to see how cryptocurrency prices compare to each other.

Overall, this major revamp moves our app to a new codebase that’s more stable, allowing us to fix bugs more quickly and release new features on a more regular basis.

The Nexo Wallet App 2.0 is just the beginning – we’ve already got some exciting things in the pipeline. Our team will keep working their socks off, releasing new features, and bringing you the most innovative crypto products out there!
